subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Barry Larkin, who played 19 seasons for the Reds, and the late Ron Santo, who played third base for the Cubs, were the latest to receive baseball’s highest honor.
snippet: Barry Larkin, who played 19 seasons for the Reds, and the late Ron Santo, who played third base for the Cubs, were the latest to receive baseball’s highest honor.
